name: Sacrifice
primaryTexts: Release up to 3 of your non-fighter ships from the Cabal.
Place up to 2 of those released units in systems that contains at least one of your space docks.
secondaryTexts: Select a system with at least one of your non-fighter ships. For each non-fighter ship, roll a die; on a 3 or lower, it is captured. Gain Trade Goods equal to the total value of captured units.
